original_title: Condolences From The Vulgar Tongue or (Boner)
overview: Huxley, a jaded dog and victim of the universe, shuts out his brother and chooses to burden himself with the responsibility of arranging his motherâ€™s funeral. Little does he know, by enlisting in a questionable marketing scheme as a door-to-door bone salesman, his success comes at a price.
title: Condolences From The Vulgar Tongue or (Boner)
